TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Ye-lu-sa-len, title = Ye-lu-sa-len, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ye-lu-sa-len} }

S.FORM: == Ye-lu-sa-len 耶路撒冷 == likisi歷史 Ye-lu-sa-len u Pa-le-se-tan kitidaan nu macimacian, Ye-se'-lea tatengan mikuwan tinatukayan palanuheni a suo-tu, ina Lin-he-kuo mimelaway tu Pa-le-se-tan kanatal saan nu Walian u suo-tu nu nika kanatal. sumamaday nu O-cuo a tademaw palatatelungan nu kitakid. Ye-lu-sa-len itida i Ti-cun-hay atu Se-hay a laa'dan, u aayaw nu likisi a kitakid nu tatelungan nu kiwkay, u kapahay a nipidiputan tu Ya-puo-la-han nu sinza nu sakalahat a tukayan. Ye-lu-sa-len tawya u Ya-puo-la-han nu kiwkay a angangangan. namaka kunyen nu ayawan tu cacay a bataan nu seci, Suo-luo-men patideng tu sayaway a kiwkayan, Ye-lu-sa-len u Yiw-tay-cia tatelungan nu sasasinzaan atu sailayay a tukay, tawya sailayay nu kiwkay a liwan nu cabeng, u Yiw-tay-cia sa kapahay a kitidaan. kahemek nu sinza ku Ye-lu-sa-len, sakamusa "bangcalay a cudad" idaw ku sulit, itida ci Ye-su malabades, tademen, maudipaca, tayda i tapukuan. Yi-se-lan-ciw padadanan ku Ye-lu-sa-len malaMay-cia, May-ti-na tu nikuda a saka tulu a kahemekan nu kitidaan, sapikineng ci Mu-han-muo-de a saculil tu labii, patideng tu kahemekan nu kiwkay i buyu nu tusaay a Cin-cen-se, A-ke'-lun-Cin-cen-se atu Yun-teng-Cen-cen-se sapikineng tina kawawan. namaka caysiwlimpic mahcaan sakatulu nu nikalepacawan nu Cung-tun nikuda, mikuwan ku Yi-se-len tu hamin nu Ye-lu-sa-len kitidaan, pasutipan Ye-lu-sa-len atu wali Ye-lu-sa-len, atu malumanay a tukay. Yi-se-lea atu Pa-le-se-tan kanatal sakamusa u Ye-lu-sa-len u nuheni a Suo-tu sa, Yiw-tay tademaw, sinza atu Mu-se-lin palutatengan ina kitidaan u nuheni a sakahemekan nu kiwkay sa. nika ninatusaay a kanatal itini i kitakid nu siakayan caay namin palutatengan tu nu henian. 自1967 . saan ku katuuday nida dukay caay henay kaw tatengaay, masasuwalay henay ku Yi-se-lea atu Pa-le-se-tan. Hatidaay nu kanatal u Yi-se-lea ta-se-kun itida namin patideng i Te'-la-wi-hu. aydaay nu Ye-lu-sa-len u Yi-Pa kalawlawan a tatelungan. Yi-se-lea a sin-cen-ci itida i Ye-lu-sa-len kitidaan, ahebal makaala tu limnemtu pinhua-kun-li, caycay kiya kenisa a niyadu', u Ye-lu-sa-len kenisa a kitidaan. . imi nu kiwkay宗教意義 Ye-lu-sa-len u Yiw-tay-cyaw, Ci-tu-cyaw atu Yi-se-lan-cyaw, tabakiay nu kasenengan nu kiwkay. satabakien ku imi Yi-se-lan-cyaw atu Ci-tu-cyaw tademaw milawit tu kitakid a pakiw nu tademawan, Ye-lu-sa-len sisa malakakaadihan nu kitakiday a angangangan. Ye-lu-sa-len itini nu tuluay a Ya-puo-la-han kiwkay u Yiw-tay-cyaw, Ci-tu-cyaw atu Yi-se-lan-cyaw atu nu duma a adidiay nu kiwkayan. Tusepsepsep mihcaan idaw ku nipikizang tu mihcaan, Ye-lu-sa-len idaw ku caytusepsip a kiwkayan, caylimwal kiwkay atu piclu ku Cin-cen-se. nika Ye-lu-sa-len u kiwkay atu kiwkay sakalecad namin, yadah ku lawlaw, picidekan u seng-ten-buyu'. . namaka nu ayawan nu cacay a lasubu a se-cian, Su-luo-men-sen-tin "sayaway a sen-tin" itida i Ye-lu-sa-len patideng, Ye-lu-sa-len u Yiw-tay-cyaw palutatengaan a tatelungan atu sakasenengan a tukay. Ye-lu-sa-len misuayaw tu sakasenengan tu Yiw-tay-cyaw mahida tu caay ka sumad. kalawpesan nu Ye-lu-sa-len i nu ayawan idaw ku nisingaan tu bangcalay a cudad, u sakaetiman nu Yiw-tay-cyaw, u Ta-se-ci a cacay ku situngusay a micumud cacay a mihcaan kina cacay a micumud. 自從前10世紀, . u tatama nu Yi-se-ley nu cacayay a mihcaan a kinatulu a micumud i Ye-lu-sa-len " Yi-ye-cey, Cu-pun-cey, U-cen-cey", nu kiwkay a demiad.ayda, pulung nu kitakid a Yiw-tay kiwkay anu minulitu kanca pasayda i Ye-lu-sa-len, anu idaw ku nisikian tu luma' pasayda i Ye-lu-sa-len, pasaydan i tatelungan a kitidaan, kun-yen pitu a bataan mihcaan kiwkay tastasen nu Luo-ma a tademaw, u liwan satu i midihingay i nutipana a buyu'an. nutipan, malasaka tusa a matastasay a kiwkayan, sisa malaYiw-tay-cyaw sakasenengan nu kiwkayan a kakitidaan. . Ciw-lu kasikadan nu Ye-lu-sa-len, caay kaimalumanay a cudadan ku sasakamuen, saan i Ye-lu-sa-len u kalabadesan ni Ye-su, pitademan atu kahukacean nida. saan ci Ye-su anu miinuli sadihemayen ku balucu' atu utunasi, " caay kay tiniay a buyu', caay kay Ye-lu-sa-len". saan i hukuingngay a cuda. lecuhan ci Ye-su pataydaen tu i Ye-lu-sa-len, sabaw tusa ku mihcaan ni Ye-su miladay tu wama atu wina tayda i Ye-lu-sa-len midiput tu E'-ye-cye, i kalabadesan mikasaw tu kiwkay. itida ci Ye-su i Ye-lu-sa-len, tiya demiadan, tu sadikuday nida pilipayan a maudip. micumud tu Ye-lu-sa-len ci Ye-su sadikuday nu nikalabiay a kitidaan i Si-an-san, midepit ci Ta-wi wan ku lunem. Ilabu nu Ye-lu-sa-len idaw ku "kalabadesan a dadan" atu "kalabadesan tu sabaw sepat a dadan", mikineng ci Ye-suan nipimuku tu ziwzika muculil pasayda i tatabata. . ya kitidaan u pipacekan ci Ye-su tu ziwzikaan, itida i aydaay a lunem nu kiwkay, u malumanay a tukay a angangangan a kiwkay atu kilisetu tataydaan a kitidaan. itini i Ye-han-hukuing inakitidaan u Ye-lu-sa-len sa, ayda nipikinkiwan tina ke-ke-kitidaan u laa'd tu Ye-lu-sa-len malumanay a cabengan caay kaw mibataday, itini tu i tukayan. 各各他, . Ye-lu-sa-len saan u sakatulu nu Yi-se-lan-cyaw a sakatulu nu tabakiay a kiwkayan. itini i May-cya, ina Ye-lu-sa-len u Mu-se-lin nu inulian a kitidaan. itini i nemtusep mihcaan ci Mu-han-muo-de tapuku nu labii "Mu-se-lin palutatengan ci Mu-han-muo-de itida i labii mahicaay kiya a namakayda i May-cya katukuh i Ye-lu-sa-len kiwkay, macakat taydan i tapukuan, masasuadih atu maluayaway a tademawan" nikuda, Ye-lu-sa-len kuwanen tu nu Mu-se-lin. itini i "ku-lan-cuda" saan sabaw pitu a balih nu sakacacay nisulitan Mu-han-muo-de salabisa muculil pasayda i Ye-lu-sa-len a kawawan, aydaay a Ye-lu-sa-len sen-san i pabaw tusa ku Cin-cen-se idaw ku nipikiningan ci Ye-suan, hacacay sa i Ku-lan-cin nasakamuan u A-ke'-sa' cin-cen-se', u Mu-se-lin palutatengan ci Mu-han-muo-de salabisa mikayakay a sapikayakay a ba'tuan itida i yen-din-cin-cen-se. . lalangawan文化 amica u Ye-lu-sa-len angangangan u kiwkay ku sakahemekan i kitakidan, nika nina tukayan idaw ku yadahay nu duma u nalimaan a lalangawan. Yi-se-lea pu-u-kun u Ye-lu-sa-len u tadaangangangan nu yi-su-puo-u-kun, tu mihmihcaan makaala tu cacay a wangan nu taydaay a midang, tulu nu cacayan namakaydaay namini i Yi-se-lea kanatal. 80,000 pin-hun-kun-ce puo-u-kun pasupinaay a yi-su-cikuo, u sasalusimetan namakacuwacuwaay a kitakidan nu kaw-ku-sya, nituktukan atu nalimaan a tuudan. ti-siw-puo-u-kun itda i tatelungan nu Ye-lu-sa-len, tada papadengan u Yi-se-lea yi-su-cia ci An-na.Ti-siw a nalimaan. . Yiw-tay pipacukan a kakiningan u Ye-se-lea a tademaw ku katuuday nu tataydan miadih, ilabu idaw ku satabakiay nu kitakidan a nikapapacukan a cudadan. puo-u-kun namakayda i Yiw-tay nakamuan tu nipipacukan. nu duma a puo-u-kun nipisingaan u lalimaan sa. tu mihmkhcaan nu kakiningan nu nipipacukan idaw tu ku tayniay mikining. Yiw-tay-papacukan a kakiningan u sapikinkiw atu sapakatineng a cikuo, nu tayniay a tademaw taneng misuayaw tu Yiw-tay sapipacukaw a kawaw mamidateng sa. . sakaudip經濟 itini i likisi, miliyas ku Ye-lu-sa-len tu Yea-hua atu Cya-sa a anganganan nu minatu, sakaudip nu heni namakayda namini i nipicaw-sen i Ye-lu-sa-len a kikayan, ayda mahida tu u namakacuwacuwaay a tayniay nu micaw-senay, hatidaay tu nu tayniay a tademaw kanca miadih aca tu si-ceyn atu Ye-lu-sa-len a tukayan, nika namaka caysiwlimpic mihcaan, itini i Ye-lu-sa-len sakay sakaudip idaw t uku nikacakatan, cay kaw kiwkay a cacay ku tataydaan sa. 歷史上, .

== Ye-lo-sa-len 耶路撒冷 == likisi歷史 Ye-lo-sa-len o Pa-le-se-tan kitidaan no macimacian, Ye-se'-lea tatengan mikowan tinatokayan palanoheni a soo-to, ina Lin-he-koo mimelaway to Pa-le-se-tan kanatal saan no Walian o soo-to no nika kanatal. somamaday no O-coo a tademaw palatatelongan no kitakid. Ye-lo-sa-len itida i Ti-con-hay ato Se-hay a laa'dan, o aayaw no likisi a kitakid no tatelongan no kiwkay, o kapahay a nipidipotan to Ya-poo-la-han no sinza no sakalahat a tokayan. Ye-lo-sa-len tawya o Ya-poo-la-han no kiwkay a angangangan. namaka konyen no ayawan to cacay a bataan no seci, Soo-loo-men patideng to sayaway a kiwkayan, Ye-lo-sa-len o Yiw-tay-cia tatelongan no sasasinzaan ato sailayay a tokay, tawya sailayay no kiwkay a liwan no cabeng, o Yiw-tay-cia sa kapahay a kitidaan. kahemek no sinza ko Ye-lo-sa-len, sakamosa "bangcalay a codad" idaw ko solit, itida ci Ye-so malabades, tademen, maodipaca, tayda i tapokoan. Yi-se-lan-ciw padadanan ko Ye-lo-sa-len malaMay-cia, May-ti-na to nikoda a saka tolo a kahemekan no kitidaan, sapikineng ci Mo-han-moo-de a sacolil to labii, patideng to kahemekan no kiwkay i boyo no tosaay a Cin-cen-se, A-ke'-lon-Cin-cen-se ato Yon-teng-Cen-cen-se sapikineng tina kawawan. namaka caysiwlimpic mahcaan sakatolo no nikalepacawan no Cong-ton nikoda, mikowan ko Yi-se-len to hamin no Ye-lo-sa-len kitidaan, pasotipan Ye-lo-sa-len ato wali Ye-lo-sa-len, ato malomanay a tokay. Yi-se-lea ato Pa-le-se-tan kanatal sakamosa o Ye-lo-sa-len o noheni a Soo-to sa, Yiw-tay tademaw, sinza ato Mo-se-lin palotatengan ina kitidaan o noheni a sakahemekan no kiwkay sa. nika ninatosaay a kanatal itini i kitakid no siakayan caay namin palotatengan to no henian. 自1967 . saan ko katooday nida dokay caay henay kaw tatengaay, masasowalay henay ko Yi-se-lea ato Pa-le-se-tan. Hatidaay no kanatal o Yi-se-lea ta-se-kon itida namin patideng i Te'-la-wi-ho. aydaay no Ye-lo-sa-len o Yi-Pa kalawlawan a tatelongan. Yi-se-lea a sin-cen-ci itida i Ye-lo-sa-len kitidaan, ahebal makaala to limnemto pinhoa-kon-li, caycay kiya kenisa a niyado', o Ye-lo-sa-len kenisa a kitidaan. . imi no kiwkay宗教意義 Ye-lo-sa-len o Yiw-tay-cyaw, Ci-to-cyaw ato Yi-se-lan-cyaw, tabakiay no kasenengan no kiwkay. satabakien ko imi Yi-se-lan-cyaw ato Ci-to-cyaw tademaw milawit to kitakid a pakiw no tademawan, Ye-lo-sa-len sisa malakakaadihan no kitakiday a angangangan. Ye-lo-sa-len itini no toloay a Ya-poo-la-han kiwkay o Yiw-tay-cyaw, Ci-to-cyaw ato Yi-se-lan-cyaw ato no doma a adidiay no kiwkayan. Tosepsepsep mihcaan idaw ko nipikizang to mihcaan, Ye-lo-sa-len idaw ko caytosepsip a kiwkayan, caylimwal kiwkay ato piclo ko Cin-cen-se. nika Ye-lo-sa-len o kiwkay ato kiwkay sakalecad namin, yadah ko lawlaw, picidekan o seng-ten-boyo'. . namaka no ayawan no cacay a lasobo a se-cian, So-loo-men-sen-tin "sayaway a sen-tin" itida i Ye-lo-sa-len patideng, Ye-lo-sa-len o Yiw-tay-cyaw palotatengaan a tatelongan ato sakasenengan a tokay. Ye-lo-sa-len misoayaw to sakasenengan to Yiw-tay-cyaw mahida to caay ka somad. kalawpesan no Ye-lo-sa-len i no ayawan idaw ko nisingaan to bangcalay a codad, o sakaetiman no Yiw-tay-cyaw, o Ta-se-ci a cacay ko sitongosay a micomod cacay a mihcaan kina cacay a micomod. 自從前10世紀, . o tatama no Yi-se-ley no cacayay a mihcaan a kinatolo a micomod i Ye-lo-sa-len " Yi-ye-cey, Co-pon-cey, U-cen-cey", no kiwkay a demiad.ayda, polong no kitakid a Yiw-tay kiwkay ano minolito kanca pasayda i Ye-lo-sa-len, ano idaw ko nisikian to loma' pasayda i Ye-lo-sa-len, pasaydan i tatelongan a kitidaan, kon-yen pito a bataan mihcaan kiwkay tastasen no Loo-ma a tademaw, o liwan sato i midihingay i notipana a boyo'an. notipan, malasaka tosa a matastasay a kiwkayan, sisa malaYiw-tay-cyaw sakasenengan no kiwkayan a kakitidaan. . Ciw-lo kasikadan no Ye-lo-sa-len, caay kaimalomanay a codadan ko sasakamoen, saan i Ye-lo-sa-len o kalabadesan ni Ye-so, pitademan ato kahokacean nida. saan ci Ye-so ano miinoli sadihemayen ko baloco' ato otonasi, " caay kay tiniay a boyo', caay kay Ye-lo-sa-len". saan i hokoingngay a coda. lecohan ci Ye-so pataydaen to i Ye-lo-sa-len, sabaw tosa ko mihcaan ni Ye-so miladay to wama ato wina tayda i Ye-lo-sa-len midipot to E'-ye-cye, i kalabadesan mikasaw to kiwkay. itida ci Ye-so i Ye-lo-sa-len, tiya demiadan, to sadikoday nida pilipayan a maodip. micomod to Ye-lo-sa-len ci Ye-so sadikoday no nikalabiay a kitidaan i Si-an-san, midepit ci Ta-wi wan ko lonem. Ilabo no Ye-lo-sa-len idaw ko "kalabadesan a dadan" ato "kalabadesan to sabaw sepat a dadan", mikineng ci Ye-soan nipimoko to ziwzika mocolil pasayda i tatabata. . ya kitidaan o pipacekan ci Ye-so to ziwzikaan, itida i aydaay a lonem no kiwkay, o malomanay a tokay a angangangan a kiwkay ato kiliseto tataydaan a kitidaan. itini i Ye-han-hokoing inakitidaan o Ye-lo-sa-len sa, ayda nipikinkiwan tina ke-ke-kitidaan o laa'd to Ye-lo-sa-len malomanay a cabengan caay kaw mibataday, itini to i tokayan. 各各他, . Ye-lo-sa-len saan o sakatolo no Yi-se-lan-cyaw a sakatolo no tabakiay a kiwkayan. itini i May-cya, ina Ye-lo-sa-len o Mo-se-lin no inolian a kitidaan. itini i nemtosep mihcaan ci Mo-han-moo-de tapoko no labii "Mo-se-lin palotatengan ci Mo-han-moo-de itida i labii mahicaay kiya a namakayda i May-cya katokoh i Ye-lo-sa-len kiwkay, macakat taydan i tapokoan, masasoadih ato maloayaway a tademawan" nikoda, Ye-lo-sa-len kowanen to no Mo-se-lin. itini i "ko-lan-coda" saan sabaw pito a balih no sakacacay nisolitan Mo-han-moo-de salabisa mocolil pasayda i Ye-lo-sa-len a kawawan, aydaay a Ye-lo-sa-len sen-san i pabaw tosa ko Cin-cen-se idaw ko nipikiningan ci Ye-soan, hacacay sa i Ko-lan-cin nasakamoan o A-ke'-sa' cin-cen-se', o Mo-se-lin palotatengan ci Mo-han-moo-de salabisa mikayakay a sapikayakay a ba'toan itida i yen-din-cin-cen-se. . lalangawan文化 amica o Ye-lo-sa-len angangangan o kiwkay ko sakahemekan i kitakidan, nika nina tokayan idaw ko yadahay no doma o nalimaan a lalangawan. Yi-se-lea po-o-kon o Ye-lo-sa-len o tadaangangangan no yi-so-poo-o-kon, to mihmihcaan makaala to cacay a wangan no taydaay a midang, tolo no cacayan namakaydaay namini i Yi-se-lea kanatal. 80,000 pin-hon-kon-ce poo-o-kon pasopinaay a yi-so-cikoo, o sasalosimetan namakacowacowaay a kitakidan no kaw-ko-sya, nitoktokan ato nalimaan a toodan. ti-siw-poo-o-kon itda i tatelongan no Ye-lo-sa-len, tada papadengan o Yi-se-lea yi-so-cia ci An-na.Ti-siw a nalimaan. . Yiw-tay pipacokan a kakiningan o Ye-se-lea a tademaw ko katooday no tataydan miadih, ilabo idaw ko satabakiay no kitakidan a nikapapacokan a codadan. poo-o-kon namakayda i Yiw-tay nakamoan to nipipacokan. no doma a poo-o-kon nipisingaan o lalimaan sa. to mihmkhcaan no kakiningan no nipipacokan idaw to ko tayniay mikining. Yiw-tay-papacokan a kakiningan o sapikinkiw ato sapakatineng a cikoo, no tayniay a tademaw taneng misoayaw to Yiw-tay sapipacokaw a kawaw mamidateng sa. . sakaodip經濟 itini i likisi, miliyas ko Ye-lo-sa-len to Yea-hoa ato Cya-sa a anganganan no minato, sakaodip no heni namakayda namini i nipicaw-sen i Ye-lo-sa-len a kikayan, ayda mahida to o namakacowacowaay a tayniay no micaw-senay, hatidaay to no tayniay a tademaw kanca miadih aca to si-ceyn ato Ye-lo-sa-len a tokayan, nika namaka caysiwlimpic mihcaan, itini i Ye-lo-sa-len sakay sakaodip idaw t oko nikacakatan, cay kaw kiwkay a cacay ko tataydaan sa. 歷史上, .
